revision.text:
{{multiple image | image1 = Wrap Pant 1.jpg | alt1 = | caption1 = Low rise, flat seamed, straight-leg cotton yoga pant | image2 = Wrap Pant 2.jpg | alt2 = | caption2 = [[Lululemon]]'s boot cut and flared yoga pant. | image3 = Project Yoga Richmond 2.jpg | alt3 = | caption3 = Yoga pants are used in activities involving physical exercise | footer = | direction = vertical }} '''Yoga pants''' are a type of flexible, form-fitting pants designed for the practice of [[yoga]] as well as other physical activities that involve a lot of movement, bending and stretching. They are typically worn for sports and physical exercise, [[martial arts]], [[dancing]], [[pilates]], or [[aerobics]]. These pants are generally made from a blend of cotton, lycra spandex, nylon, polyester, wool, or a similarly light and [[stretch fabric|stretchy synthetic material]] giving the pants a very soft, smooth, polished and silky finish when worn.{{Cite web |url=https://www.washingtonpost.com/posteverything/wp/2016/12/15/yoga-pants-are-comfy-theyre-also-an-assault-on-manners-and-a-nihilistic-threat/ |title=Yoga pants are comfy. They're also an assault on manners and a nihilistic threat. |last= Folan |first=Kerry |date=15 December 2016 |publisher= |work=The Washington Post}}
- {{cite web | url=http://business.financialpost.com/business-insider/the-long-strange-history-of-lululemon-athletica-inc-north-americas-weirdest-clothing-brand | title=The long, strange history of Lululemon Athletica Inc, North America's weirdest clothing bran | publisher= |work=Business Insider | date=4 September 2015 | accessdate=2 October 2016 | author=Edwards, Jim}}{{cite web|last=Smith|first=S.E.|title=What are Yoga Pants?|url=http://www.wisegeek.com/what-are-yoga-pants.htm|work=WG|publisher=wiseGEEK|accessdate=5 December 2011}} Although designed specifically for yoga, the pants are also casually worn as everyday dress by many women.{{cite web | url=http://www.slate.com/blogs/xx_factor/2014/01/03/_workout_wear_friday_and_yoga_pants_that_look_like_dress_pants_no.html | title=Workout Wear Friday Is Not a Thing | publisher= |work=Slate | date=Jan 3, 2014 | accessdate=30 January 2014 | author=Jessica Grose}}
- {{cite web | url=http://pilates.about.com/od/pilatesclothing/p/Find-The-Best-Pilates-And-Yoga-Pants-For-You.htm | title=Find the Best Pilates and Yoga Pants for You | publisher= |website=pilates.about.com | date=October 8, 2013 | accessdate=30 January 2014 | author=Marguerite Ogle}}
- {{cite web|last=Brodesser-Akner|first=Taffy|authorlink=Taffy Brodesser-Akner|title=To Stretch or Not to Stretch|url=https://www.nytimes.com/2011/03/17/fashion/17elastic.html?pagewanted=all|publisher= |work=[[New York Times]]|accessdate=5 December 2011|date=16 March 2011}}
- {{cite web | url=http://fortune.com/2015/06/04/like-it-or-not-designer-yoga-pants-have-become-legitimate-office-wear/ | title=Like it or not, designer yoga pants have become legitimate office wear | publisher= |work=Fortune | date=4 June 2015 | accessdate=4 September 2016 | author=Colleen Kane}}
- {{cite web|url=https://www.theatlantic.com/health/archive/2013/12/psychology-of-lululemon-how-fashion-affects-fitness/281959/|title=Psychology of Lululemon: How Fashion Affects Fitness | publisher= |work=The Atlantic | date=12 December 2013 | accessdate=4 September 2016 | author=Wiebe, Jamie}} ==Types of yoga pants== According to Anu Hastings with the product database [[Indix]], over 2,700 types of so-called "yoga pants" are now available on the market.{{Cite web|url = http://www.indix.com/indix-product-bite-yoga-pants-taking-world/|title = Indix|date = 18 September 2014|accessdate = 21 April 2015|website = Indix|publisher = Indix|last = Hastings|first = Anu}} There are various types and styles, including the traditional boot-cut and flared yoga pants with flat [[waistband]]s.{{cite web | url=http://elitedaily.com/women/the-19-reasons-all-women-worship-yoga-pants/ | title=#DefaultOutfit: The 19 Reasons All Women Worship Yoga Pants | publisher= |website=Elite Daily | date=27 January 2014 | accessdate=2 October 2015 | author=Ashley Fern}} The typical type of yoga pants traditionally come in black, are tight-fitted, boot-cut, and flared style, are reversible, carry a four way stretch fabric and have a flat elastic waistband folded over at the top. The traditional boot-cut and flared yoga pants with waistbands are the most well-known and most popular type, generally used for casual wear, active wear, lounge wear, maternity wear, dancewear or clubwear.{{cite web | url=https://www.kelownanow.com/columns/The_Style_Files/news/Nicole_Young/14/07/07/What_to_Wear_to_the_Club_for_Women/|title=What to Wear to the Club for Women | publisher= |website=Kelowna Now | date=7 July 2014 | accessdate=8 October 2016 | author=Nicole Young}}
- {{cite web | url=https://nypost.com/2016/08/06/how-to-go-clubbing-in-gym-clothes-and-not-look-like-a-slob/ | title=How to go clubbing in gym clothes and not look like a slob | publisher= |work=New York Post | date=6 August 2016 | accessdate=8 October 2016 | author=Raquel Laneri}}
- {{cite web | url=http://www.canadianbusiness.com/blogs-and-comment/lululemon-and-go-branding-mistake/ | title=The new "&go" brand won't fix what's rotten at Lululemon's core: Bruce Philp | publisher= |work=Canadian Business | date=20 March 2014 | accessdate=8 October 2016 | author=Bruce Philp}}
- {{cite web | url=http://www.slate.com/blogs/xx_factor/2014/01/29/yoga_pants_are_the_perfect_choice_for_a_night_of_dancing.html | title=Yoga Pants in da Club? Great Idea | publisher= |work=Slate | date=29 January 2014 | accessdate=24 October 2015 | author=Jessica Grose}}
- {{cite web | url=http://sadhanaclothing.com/blogs/our-blog/18981099-why-women-love-wearing-yoga-pants | title=Why Women Love Wearing Yoga Pants | publisher=Sadhana | date=4 March 2015 | accessdate= 24 October 2015}}
- {{cite web | url=http://www.vancouversun.com/life/fashion-beauty/yoga+sweats+pants/4636926/story.html | title=Yoga sweats are not pants | publisher=|work=The Vancouver Sun | date=18 April 2011 | accessdate=24 October 2015 | author=Suzanne Wexler}} They are tight-fitted, giving them flexibility and comfort as well as the moisture-wicking fabrics within the pants move perspiration away from the body to the fabric's outer surface where it can evaporate giving the pants an advantage when worn during physical activities that exert heavy perspiration keeping the wearer cool and comfortable.{{cite web | url=http://www.goodhousekeeping.com/institute/a19218/absorbent-activewear/ | title=Absorbent Activewear | publisher= |work=Good Housekeeping | date=15 June 2011 | accessdate=12 September 2016 | author=Kevin Sweeney}} The flat and fold-over waists are utilized to provide flexibility, comfort, coverage, style, breathability and versatility. Flat and fold-over waist boot cut and flare yoga pants are commonly used as casual wear, workout and exercise wear, maternity wear, making errands, lounging around the house, yoga class, or as [[clubwear]] as women would wear the body-hugging pants to permit freedom of movement when dancing during nights out at their local nightclub.{{Cite web |url=https://mancavin.com/galleries/club-scene/ |title=Club Girls: 10 Types of Girls You See at a Nightclub |date=29 December 2016 |website=Mancavin}}
- {{Cite web |url=https://cilisos.my/4-must-haves-for-a-safe-night-of-clubbing-in-kl-while-still-looking-fabulous-duh/ |title=4 must-haves for a safe night of clubbing in KL (while still looking fabulous, duh) |last= Ho-Lee |first=Jasmine |date=14 April 2014 |website= Cilisos}}
- {{Cite web |url=http://www.shape.com/fitness/clothes/workout-clothes-you-can-wear-night-out |title=Workout Clothes You Can Wear On a Night Out |last= Malacoff |first=Julia |date=29 December 2015}}
- {{cite web | url=http://yoganonymous.com/you-can-find-them-in-da-club-yoga-pants-are-you-down-with-the-y-p-p/ | title=You Can Find them In da Club: Yoga Pants? | publisher= |website=Yoganonymous | date=28 January 2014 | accessdate=24 October 2015}}
- {{cite web | url=http://shine.yahoo.com/fashion/20-places-moms-wear-yoga-pants-without-embarrassing-184300782.html | title=20 Places Moms Can Wear Yoga Pants Without Embarrassing Themselves | publisher= |website=Yahoo | date=16 November 2012 | accessdate=3 September 2013}}
- {{cite web | url=http://www.scarymommy.com/7-reasons-yoga-pants-are-a-mommy-must/ | title=7 Reasons Yoga Pants Are A Mommy Must | publisher= |website=Scary Mommy | accessdate=3 September 2013}}
- {{cite web | url=http://styleblazer.com/199801/yoga-pants-club-maybe-one-day/ | title=Yoga Pants At The Club? Maybe One Day | publisher=Style Blazer | accessdate=15 May 2014}} Typically, the more spandex in the yoga pants, the more likely they are used as exercise, dance or clubwear.{{Cite web |url=https://www.popsugar.com/fitness/Get-Look-Minka-Kelly-Lululemon-Pants-675492 |title=Get the Look: Minka Kelly's Lululemon Pants |date=3 October 2007 |publisher= |website=Popsugar}}
- {{Cite web |url=https://cilisos.my/4-must-haves-for-a-safe-night-of-clubbing-in-kl-while-still-looking-fabulous-duh/ |title=4 must-haves for a safe night of clubbing in KL (while still looking fabulous, duh) |last= Ho-Lee |first=Jasmine |date=14 April 2014 |website= Cilisos}}
- {{Cite web |url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/gregpetro/2015/09/16/lululemon-nike-and-the-rise-of-athleisure/#17f328644c1d |title=Lululemon, Nike And The Rise Of 'Athleisure|work=Forbes |last=Petro |first=Greg |date=16 September 2015}} The more cotton fabrics are more commonly used for loungewear.{{cite web | url=http://searchingforstyle.com/2011/01/we-dont-need-silver-lining/ | title=We Don't Need Silver Lining | publisher=|website=Searching for Style | date=3 January 2011 | accessdate=14 July 2013 | author=Alexandra Suhner Isenberg}}{{cite web | url=https://www.washingtonpost.com/blogs/going-out-guide/wp/2014/01/28/ink-lounge-and-tattoo-bar-want-to-see-your-yoga-pants-in-the-club/?tid=up_next | title=Ink Lounge and Tattoo Bar want to see your yoga pants in the club | publisher=|work=Washington Post | date=28 January 2014 | accessdate=15 May 2014 | author=Fritz Hahn}} There are various types and styles of yoga pants in addition to the traditional.{{cite web | url=http://drunktuesday.com/2012/10/10/uggs-yoga-pants-and-north-face-the-yugga-face-season-at-penn-state/ | title=Uggs, Yoga Pants, and North Face: The Yugga Face Season at Penn State | publisher= |website=Drunk Tuesday | date=10 October 2012 | accessdate=30 August 2013 | author=Brandon K. Smith}}
- {{cite web | url=http://metronews.ca/voices/she-says/8913/uggs-crocs-yoga-pants-and-now-leggings/ | title=Uggs, crocs, yoga pants and now … leggings | publisher= |website=Metronews.ca | date=20 September 2011 | accessdate=30 August 2013 | author=Jessica Napier}}
- {{cite web | url=http://www.jcunews.com/2013/02/07/february-fashion-forecast/ | title=February fashion forecast | publisher=|website=JCUnews.com | date=7 February 2013 | accessdate=30 August 2013 | author=Mary Ellen Riley}}
- {{cite web | url=http://onwardstate.com/2012/10/16/how-to-wear-or-not-wear-uggs/ | title=How to Wear (or Not Wear) UGGs | publisher= |website=Onward State | accessdate=30 August 2013}} The flared yoga pants are also commonly used as dancewear allowing it to stretch and for the ease of movement it affords. They also typically have combinations of stretchy fabric blends offered by lycra spandex and nylon giving the pants a rich and silky appearance and feel when worn. Crop-fitted yoga pants lie above the ankle (similar to capri pants), and are oftentimes utilized for a more flattering, versatile, and dressier look during warmer times of the year.[http://shoes.about.com/od/whattowearwithshoes/tp/What-To-Wear-With-Yoga-Pants.htm What to Wear with Yoga Pants]
- {{cite web | url=http://yogagainesville.weebly.com/unique-fashion-trends-of-fold-over-yoga-pants.html | title=Unique Fashion Trends of Fold Over Yoga Pants | publisher= |website=Yogagainesville | accessdate=3 September 2013}} They are used commonly as casual wear, activewear, for making errands, lounging or as clubwear on a night out.{{cite web | url=http://www.hercampus.com/school/iup/real-live-college-guy-nick-tackles-yoga-pants | title=Real Live College Guy Nick Tackles... Yoga Pants | date=26 February 2014 | accessdate=29 June 2014 | author=Nicholas Galczynski}}
- {{cite web | url=http://www.hlntv.com/article/2013/03/20/lululemon-yoga-pants-recall-stock-drop-what-wear | title=Lululemon recall: What will you wear to brunch now? | publisher=|website=HLN | date=20 March 2013 | accessdate=14 July 2013 | author=Jessica Camerata}}
- {{cite web | url=http://searchingforstyle.com/2011/09/5-instances-where-you-can-wear-yoga-pants-outside-of-the-gym/ | title=5 Instances Where You Can Wear Yoga Pants Outside of the Gym | publisher=|website=Searching for Style | date=22 September 2011 | accessdate=14 July 2013 | author=Alexandra Isenberg}}
- {{cite web | url=http://www.newsobserver.com/2013/03/25/2778692/yoga-pants-recall-could-be-good.html | title=Yoga pants recall could be a good thing | accessdate=14 July 2013}} The flared yoga pants are often paired with flip-flops, running shoes, flats, or sheepskin boots, worn along with hoodies, shawls, cardigans or wraps paired with a tank top or shirt tucked underneath.{{cite web | url=http://www.vogue.com/946824/juice-raves-morning-gloryville-daybreaker/ | title=Can Sunrise Juice Raves Finally Turn Me Into a Morning Person? | publisher= |work=Vogue | date=1 August 2014 | accessdate=8 October 2016 | author=Conrad, Jennifer}}
- {{cite web | url=http://www.fabulousafter40.com/leggings-over-40-women/ | title=Yes, Curvy Gals Can Wear Leggings Over 40! Here's How | publisher= |website=Fabulous After 40 | date=9 October 2014 | accessdate=8 October 2016}}
- {{cite web | url=https://bestreviewsbase.com/best-yoga-pants/ | title=The ultimate guide to yoga pants | publisher= |website=BestReviewsBase | date=21 October 2013 | accessdate=13 September 2016 | author=Melissa Gilbert}}
- {{cite web | url=http://www.wikihow.com/Choose-Yoga-Pants | title=How to Choose Yoga Pants: 7 Steps | publisher=|website=Wikihow | accessdate=3 September 2013}} Due to their high elasticity, yoga pants are comfortable enough to wear for many purposes. They were originally created for practicing yoga, but have become popular as everyday mainstream clothing item in classrooms, gymnasiums, restaurants, shopping malls, and nightclubs.{{cite web | url=http://business.financialpost.com/news/retail-marketing/a-sign-of-defeat-no-more-how-sweatpants-went-from-the-ultimate-fashion-taboo-to-a-designer-trend | title=How sweatpants went from 'a sign of defeat' to the new designer fashion trend | publisher= |work=Financial Post | date=30 May 2015 | accessdate=8 October 2016 | author=Shaw, Hollie}}
- {{cite web | url=http://www.thefashionspot.ca/style-trends/566985-how-to-wear-yoga-pants/ | title=The Dos and Don'ts of Wearing Yoga Pants Around Town | date=15 April 2016 | accessdate=4 October 2016 | author=Maria Denardo}}
- {{cite book | title=Ecoholic: Your Guide to the Most Environmentally Friendly Information, Products and Services in Canada | author=Adria Vasil | year=2007}}
- {{cite web | url=http://www.shape.com/fitness/clothes/10-best-instagram-accounts-follow-athleisure | title=The 10 Best Instagram Accounts to Follow for Athleisure | publisher=|website=Shape | date=27 February 2015 | accessdate=8 October 2016 | author=Melissa Ivy Katz}} ==Demand and popularity== {{external media | width = 190px | align = right | headerimage= |audio1= [https://www.sciencehistory.org/distillations/podcast/the-yoga-pant-problem “The Yoga Pant Problem“], ''Distillations'' Podcast, [[Science History Institute]] }} Demand for comfortable active, athletic, sports and casual wear has increased since the turn of the 21st century.{{cite book|last1=Stalder|first1=Erika|title=Fashion 101: A Crash Course in Clothing|date=2008|publisher=Houghton Mifflin Harcourt|isbn=9780547946931|page=59}} [[Nike, Inc.]] reported their women's business comprised 7 billion in 2010 and the larger market grew to $33.6 billion by 2015.{{cite web|title=Will yoga pants have jean makers singing the blues?|url=http://www.cbsnews.com/news/will-yoga-pants-have-jean-makers-singing-the-blues/|website=CBS Money Watch|publisher=|accessdate=22 April 2015}} Nike claims the driving factor has been by the demand for fashionable workout gear that is also flattering. New colors, patterns, and structural design of yoga pants created more versatility and increased their wear in public settings. Author Mae Anderson described the new craze of yoga pants outside the gym by calling them the "new jeans."{{Cite web|url = http://www.denverpost.com/lifestyles/ci_24595974/how-yoga-pants-became-new-jeans|title = How yoga pants became the new jeans.|date = 25 November 2013|accessdate = 2 April 2015|website = Denver Post|publisher = |last = Anderson|first = Mae}} Many high-end fashion houses and mass-market trend-chasers have capitalized on the growth of the modern sportswear market, leading an emphasis on technical fabrics and garments that facilitate wearing them as everyday dress. Market research analysts have sought to explain the trend by referencing the extension of work hours in major cities across North America, leading to a "day-to-night" than a "gym-to-work"—while other explanations cite the North American passion for fitness and healthy living.{{cite web | url=http://www.highsnobiety.com/2014/06/12/technical-fabric-in-fashion/ | title=Technical Fabric in Fashion is Here to Stay | publisher=|website=HighSnobiety | date=2 June 2014 | accessdate=2 October 2016 | author=Brundage, Douglas}} == Wearing in public== In the United States, reaction to the wider adoption of yoga pants proved somewhat controversial for schools.{{cite news|last1=Foley|first1=Heather|title=Your guide to America's war on yoga pants|url=http://www.boston.com/lifestyle/fashion/2014/04/10/america-war-yoga-pants/C7cE8EIbZdjTLbMW9luL6H/story.html|work=Boston.com|date=10 April 2014}} Some schools adopted [[dress codes]] banning yoga pants for all students, or banning them only for female students.{{Cite web|url = https://www.bostonglobe.com/metro/regionals/north/2014/03/06/rockport-high-school-leggings-ban-controversy-still-simmers/bB6p4Q7AQeriyIACzAjlWJ/story.html|title = Rockport High School leggings-ban controversy still simmers|date = 6 March 2014|accessdate = 9 April 2015|website = The Boston Globe|publisher = |last = Shemkus|first = Sarah}}{{Cite web|url = http://www.nydailynews.com/news/national/distracting-yoga-pants-banned-officials-north-dakota-high-school-article-1.1962380|title = 'Distracting' yoga pants banned by officials at North Dakota high school|date = 3 October 2014|accessdate = 9 April 2015|website = Daily News|publisher = |last = Lestch|first = Corinne}}
- {{Cite web|url = http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2014/03/19/school-bans-leggings_n_4993941.html|title = Parents Say School's Leggings 'Ban' Is Unfair To Girls, 'Contributes To Rape Culture'|date = 19 March 2014|accessdate = 9 April 2015|website = Huffington Post|publisher = |last = |first = }} ''[[Bitch (magazine)|Bitch]]'' magazine argued such bans are largely gendered, focusing on the damage caused by "distraction" by girls;{{cite news|last1=Chin|first1=Elleanor|title=Instead of Banning Yoga Pants, Schools Should Crack Down on Harassment|url=http://bitchmagazine.org/post/instead-of-banning-yoga-pants-schools-should-crack-down-on-harassment|work=[[Bitch Magazine|Bitch]]|date=15 October 2014}} similar complaints caused a ban in [[Rockport, Massachusetts]], that was quickly reversed. There are others who agree with banning yoga pants in public. Most often the reasoning for disagreeing with wearing yoga pants publicly is that they promote a relaxed and informal atmosphere. Amanda Hallay, professor of fashion and cultural history at New York City's [[LIM College]], was interviewed for her opinion on yoga pants being a replacement for jeans. She said, "Yoga pants are a step above pajamas and we don't wear pajamas out to lunch, and we certainly don't wear them to work. Pajamas are for sleeping in, and ergo, not appropriate to wear in any other setting. The same can be said for yoga pants. Yoga pants are to be worn while doing yoga." Yoga pants being worn in public can be perceived as inappropriate and unattractive. According to Hallay, to promote a more business-like or mature persona, a person should dress as such.{{Cite journal|url = |title = That's a 'no' to yoga pants; What we wear in public has to be about more than just our comfort.|last = Rhone|first = Nedra|date = 14 March 2015|journal = Atlanta Journal-Constitution|doi = |pmid = |accessdate = }} In the U.S. state of [[Montana]], some [[Montana House of Representatives|state House]] members unsuccessfully attempted to ban the wearing of in public of "any device, costume, or covering that gives the appearance of or simulates the genitals, pubic hair, anus region, or pubic hair region." The author of the legislation, Republican David Moore, acknowledged that the measure could extend to "tight beige garments" and stated: "Yoga pants should be illegal in public anyway."Alexandra Petri, [https://www.washingtonpost.com/blogs/compost/wp/2015/02/12/absurd-things-that-almost-happened-montanas-yoga-pants-ban/ Absurd things that almost happened: Montana’s yoga pants ban], ''Washington Post'' (12 February 2015). Moore later said that the latter comment was an "off-the-cuff" joke, although the [[Associated Press]] stood by its reporting.Jessica Glenza, [https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2015/feb/14/republican-montana-yoga-pants-obscenity "Republican in Montana yoga pants obscenity uproar explains: it was a joke"], ''The Guardian'' (14 February 2015). ==See also== *[[Athleisure]] *[[Leggings]] *[[Sweatpants]] ==References== {{reflist|colwidth=30em}} == External links == * {{Commons category-inline|Yoga pants}} {{Clothing}} [[Category:2000s fashion]] [[Category:2010s fashion]] [[Category:American fashion]] [[Category:Canadian fashion]] [[Category:Dancewear]] [[Category:Lululemon Athletica]] [[Category:Maternity clothing]] [[Category:Sports clothing]] [[Category:Trousers and shorts]] [[Category:Yoga|Pants]]
